colder package

Welcome to the package documentation of colder. The library is structured as follows: some modules are provided to the user in order to input the physical system configuration and perform the main operations. This is the case of the main modules (simulation and models). The support models are the backbone of the library and provide lower level interface to various backends and core functionalities.

main modules

  • colder.simulation package
    • annealing module
      • annealing
    • COLD module
      • get_functions_from_schedule()
      • check_hamiltonian_input()
      • cold
    • numerical module
      • interpolator1D

      • chain
      • square
